duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and communicate the vision, strategy and roadmap for our B2B data platform that creates a single source of truth from multiple sourcesCollaborate with engineering, analysts and other product teams to deliver data solutions that are efficient, scalable and privacy-safeConduct user research, competitive analysis and market research to validate hypotheses and identify customer needs and pain pointsDefine success metrics, track progress and communicate results to stakeholdersManage trade-offs, risks and dependencies across multiple projects and teams

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
